version_description:
- Enhancements for iOS 9

If you enjoy Sunny, please write or update your review. It matters tremendously <3

Follow @taptanium on Twitter for updates.

+ New: Deep integration with Windy and my new app: Away.
Please also update Windy so you can enjoy the deep integration :)

+ Enhanced Sleep Timer.
+ New: Seagulls :)
+ Deep integration with Flow, the fantastic new sequel to Windy, Sunny & Away: Add flowing water soundscapes & guided meditation to your collection!
+ Reduced energy consumption.
+ Bugfixes.

Enjoying Sunny? Please let me know what you like about Sunny by updating your review. I read them all <3

+ Bugfixes.

Enjoying Sunny? Please let me know what you like about Sunny by updating your review. I read them all <3

+ User interface enhancements.
+ From now on, all beaches except the last two appear instantly unlocked :)
+ Bugfixes.

New: Get Rainy for FREE today, sleep better tonight!

+ Important improvements.
+ Removed all In-App Purchases.
+ All scenes are now fully unlocked right from the start.

Welcome to Sunny 4!

+ NEW: Optimized for iPhone X, XR, XS, XS Max, 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max & iPad Pro!
+ NEW: Remote Control support! Enable/Disable in iOS Settings under "Sunny".

Thank you for using Sunny. If you enjoy it, chances are you will also enjoy my new app Flowing 2, now available for pre-order.

Bugfixes and enhanced support of iOS 8.0 and upwards, as well as all newer iOS devices and versions.

Welcome to Sunny 4!

+ NEW: Optimized for iPhone X, XR, XS, XS Max, 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max & iPad Pro!
+ NEW: Remote Control support! Enable/Disable in iOS Settings under "Sunny".

Thank you for using Sunny. If you enjoy it, chances are you will also enjoy my new app Flowing 2, now available for pre-order.

Bugfixes and maintenance update.

Thank you for using Sunny. If you enjoy it, chances are you will also enjoy my new app Flowing 2! Check it out today, sleep great tonight!
